title: Gettysburg National Military Park: Bookstore
body: Bookstore         The Museum Bookstore (NPS)  The Museum Bookstore, located in the Gettysburg National Military Park Museum and Visitor Center, is your first stop for books, DVD's, audio battlefield tours, postcards and other items that will make your visit to Gettysburg a memory to last. The store also offers a variety of books on President and Mrs. Eisenhower and other areas of interest in the Gettysburg area. The Museum Bookstore is open during regular visitor center hours and operated in partnership with the Gettysburg Foundation by Event Network, Inc. For information on books, videos, DVD's, and other mechandise offered by the Museum Bookstore, call (717) 334-2288.
